channel.title: Help please =]
channel.description:
I need help fixing:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at client.<init>(client.java:448) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:177) at server.run(server.java:274) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]
Thank you!!
EDIT: For those of you that don't know.. After this error is printed in the CMD it won't let anyone log into the server but it won't D/C anyone either..Just won't let anyone new login even if someone logs then tries to re-login.. It gives "Error connecting to server"[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2007, 11:13:53 PM[/size][hr]=[

item.title: Help please =]
item.dc:creator: @fungame4u fungame4u
item.description:
@fungame4u wrote:

I need help fixing:

Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at client.<init>(client.java:448) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:177) at server.run(server.java:274) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

Thank you!!

EDIT: For those of you that don’t know… After this error is printed in the CMD it won’t let anyone log into the server but it won’t D/C anyone either…Just won’t let anyone new login even if someone logs then tries to re-login… It gives “Error connecting to server”[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2007, 11:13:53 PM[/size][hr]=[

Read full topic
